name: Marinated chicken thigh Filet with gratinated potatoes
instructions: Combine brown sugar, ketchup, salt, pepper, finely chopped garlic, and basil to create the marinade.
Cut the chicken thigh filets in half then coat them in the marinade and let sit for a few minutes.
Cook the chicken in a pan over medium to high heat until fully cooked and caramelized.
Cook gratinated potatoes in oven until done.
